search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Vocal Video (vocal-video.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Vocal Video is: https://vocalvideo.com/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: Vocal Video](https://assets.vocalvideo.com/assets/brand/vocal-video-horizontal-logo-1237dee3.svg)](https://vocalvideo.com/)

All plans are billed annually All Vocal Video subscriptions cover a 12-month term and are billed in one annual payment.

Free
----

For individuals and teams looking to get started 100% free.

$0

Free forever.

Publish 5 pro-style videos

Publish, share, and embed 5 pro-style videos with our free plan.

Free videos are 720p (1280x720) resolution, have a Vocal Video watermark, and can't be downloaded.

20 min. of video processing/mo

The first 20 minutes of video collected each month will be processed and available for publishing.

Over 20 minutes, collected video will be processed at the beginning of the next month.

Up to 5 video editors

Collaborate with up to 5 users in your free account.

1 video collector

Free accounts are limited to 1 active video collection campaign, with up to 3 questions for respondents.

1 brand

Multiple brands are supported in Pro and Enterprise plans.

Essential Quarterly
-------------------

For teams satisfied with standard publishing features, brand control, and legal releases.

$69 / month

Billed annually at **$828**

$69 X 12 months = $828

$69 / month

Billed quarterly at **$828**

$69 X 3 months = $828

Unlimited video publishing

Published videos are 1080p (1920x1080) resolution, have no watermarks, and can be downloaded.

4 hours of video processing

Collected videos need to be processed before they can be published.

4 hours of free video processing are included in your annual subscription.

If you reach this limit, you can purchase more video processing or upgrade your plan.

4 hour of video processing

Collected videos need to be processed before they can be published. 4 hours of free video processing is included in your quarterly subscription.

If you reach this limit, you can purchase more video processing or upgrade your plan.

1+ video editor

1 video editor seat is included. Additional editor seats can be purchased.

3 video collectors

Run up to 3 video collection campaigns at once, with up to 5 questions in each.

1 brand

Multiple brands are supported in Pro and Enterprise plans.

###### Key Features

*   **No watermarks**No Vocal Video logo will appear in your published videos.
    
*   **Unlimited video downloads**
    
    Download any published video or raw footage in 1080p HD.
    
    This lets you upload your videos to Youtube, Instagram, etc.
    
*   Control video visibility & SEOControl whether each video is publicly visible and also whether it can be indexed by Google & other search engines.
    
*   Integrate with 6,000+ apps.
    
    Connect Vocal Video to over 6,000 apps & services.
    
    Automate invitations, video downloads, incentive fulfillment, notifications, and more.
    

Annual Billing Only

Pro
---

For teams that need advanced publishing features, custom legal releases, workspaces, and more.

$139 / month

Billed annually at **$1,668**

$139 X 12 months = $1,668

Unlimited video publishing

Published videos are 1080p (1920x1080) resolution, have no watermarks, and can be downloaded.

6 hours of video processing

Collected videos need to be processed before they can be published.

6 hours of free video processing are included in your annual subscription.

If you reach this limit, you can purchase more video processing or upgrade your plan.

1+ video editor

1 video editor seat is included. Additional editor seats can be purchased.

10 video collectors

Run up to 10 video collection campaigns at once, with up to 10 questions in each collector.

Multiple brands

Support for collecting & publishing videos for multiple brands.

1 brand is included. Additional brands are billed at $50/month.

###### All **Essential** features, and...

*   [AI Effects (BG blur & removal)](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/130-background-blur-and-removal)Blur, remove, or replace video backgrounds with our AI-powered effects.
    
*   [White-labeled video collection](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/111-white-labeled-video-collection)Remove all Vocal Video branding for respondents and add a custom call to action & link after they submit their videos.
    
*   [Custom releases & waivers](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/71-setting-up-custom-releases)
    
    Upload custom video release language and require click-through consent from your respondents.
    
    Click to learn more.
    
*   [Pro video themes & fonts](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/101-video-themes)
    
    Make your videos stand out with pro-quality motion graphics & visual design, and get access 50 additional fonts to make your videos & galleries perfectly match your brand.
    
    Click to learn more.
    
*   API & analytics integration
    
    Use our API to automatically extract response data or published videos.
    
    With analytics integration, you can track views & playback of embedded videos and galleries in your own analytics software.
    
*   Kiosk mode for live eventsKiosk mode makes it easy for multiple people to record one after another on the same device. Perfect for collecting videos at live events.
    

  

Annual Billing Only

Enterprise
----------

For organizations that want to scale with full support, governance, and security. [Learn more →](https://vocalvideo.com/enterprise)

Custom

Starting at **$1,000**/month

Unlimited video publishing

Published videos are 1080p (1920x1080) resolution, have no watermarks, and can be downloaded.

Custom video processing limits

Custom user limits

Custom video collector limits

Multiple brands & workspaces

Collect & publish content for multiple brands.

Use workspaces to keep different teams' projects and videos separate, and control which users have access.

###### All **Pro** features, and...

*   Single Sign-on (SSO)Centrally control user access and provisioning with SSO.
    
*   Org-wide admin & analytics
*   Brand lockdown & control
*   Custom fontsUpload and save your brand's exact fonts for use in videos, galleries, and embeds.
    
*   Payment via invoice & ACH
*   Dedicated account manager

#### No need to pick a plan now – [create a free account](https://vocalvideo.com/signup) and upgrade when you're ready.

#### Frequently Asked Questions

What is a "pro-style" video?

Vocal Video automagically transforms raw footage from your customers, employees, and others into multi-scene videos with motion graphics, soundtracks, subtitles, and your branding.

The result: **pro-style content – without a pro.**

[Learn more and see examples →](https://vocalvideo.com/#pro-style-videos)

What kinds of videos can I create with Vocal Video?

Some of the most common ways organizations use Vocal Video:

*   Customer testimonial videos
*   Video reviews
*   Video ads for social media
*   Employee testimonial videos
*   Training videos
*   Remote candidate screening
*   Executive communication videos

Vocal Video is the perfect tool for any scenario where you want to remotely capture authentic video content from someone and share it with the world.

[Learn more about Vocal Video use cases →](https://vocalvideo.com/use-cases)

Can I download the published videos and raw footage?

**Yes, with a paid subscription.**

Check out how to [download all video testimonials and media](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/34-how-to-download-videos) collected and produced with Vocal Video.

You can also easily embed published videos on your site with any plan, free or paid. And unlike YouTube, our embeds don't include any ads.

Do I need to be familiar with video editing to use Vocal Video?

**No.** We make video editing and production dead simple. You don’t need any experience in creating video to create amazing videos your first time.

What if I want to cancel my subscription?

You'll be able to manage and cancel your subscription easily from the subscription page within your account. There are no hoops to jump through.

How is video processing calculated?

Video processing refers to minutes of video that you collect or upload to Vocal Video.

##### Free Plans

20 minutes of video processing per month is included with free plans. You can unlock more video processing by upgrading to a paid plan, or by waiting for your minutes to be refreshed next month.

##### Paid Plans

Paid plans include between 60-360 minutes of video processing for each term of your subscription.

If you exceed the included video processing, you can unlock videos by upgrading to the next tier of video processing, or waiting for your renewal to refresh the video processing included in your plan.

[Learn more →](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/108-video-processing)

Can I create video galleries and walls of love with Vocal Video?

**Yes.** With an incredibly simple drag and drop interface you can create walls of love, video carousels, slideshows, grids, and lists with Vocal Video that can be customized to share as standalone pages or embedded seamlessly on your website.

Video Galleries are available with all Vocal Video plans, including our free plan. Learn more [here](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/48-video-galleries-carousels-walls-of-love-lists-and-grids).

Do you offer discounts to educational institutions and nonprofits?

**Yes.** Please contact us for details.

Which payment formats and currencies do you accept?

All payments on our standard plans are via credit card. We use [Stripe](https://stripe.com/), the industry leader in secure payment processing. All payments are in USD.

Contact us if you need an alternative payment method.

Can I create videos for multiple clients?

**Yes.** We offer an agency model whereby you can have access to a private space for each client; Each workspace can have its own client branding and their own video collection and editing. Read our [agency program details](https://help.vocalvideo.com/article/37-vocal-video-agency-plans) to learn more.

25,000+ happy customers, including:

Try the faster, easier way to create testimonial videos.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: All plans are billed annually, with specific features and limits varying by tier.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For individuals and teams looking to get started 100% free.
For teams satisfied with standard publishing features, brand control, and legal releases.
For teams that need advanced publishing features, custom legal releases, workspaces, and more.
For organizations that want to scale with full support, governance, and security.
